works.description:
The article at the infringing location is a word by word copy of our original article.

They have removed the headings but the content is the same.

Significant portion of our article is copied. For example as follow;

Share Market is a place where everyone wants to invest their money in order to taste the Profits.

There are various sectors in the share market. Some of the known sectors are Oil, Reality meaning Real Estate.

As we saw above there are lot of sectors available in front of the investors. But which sector one should choose that will give good returns in short term and long term investments.
